channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Scoop: Tony Blair and Jared Kushner brief Trump on Gaza post-war plans
item.description: Tony Blair and Jared Kushner will participate in a meeting on Gaza at the White House on Wednesday and present President Trump with ideas for a post-w...

item.title: How tariffs are expected to shape holiday shopping sales
item.description: U.S. retailers rushed in goods ahead of tariffs — a move a new Wells Fargo report says could hit prices , product mix and holiday promotions. Why it m...

item.title: Lisa Cook's fate heads to court
item.description: Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook could file a suit over her firing as early as Wednesday in a case that could ultimately decide the limits of a pres...

item.title: Trump threatens to prosecute George Soros for backing protests
item.description: President Trump called for billionaire George Soros and his son to face charges under the federal Racketeer Influenced and Corrupt Organizations Act f...

item.title: What we know about the shooting at Annunciation Catholic Church
item.description: A shooter opened fire during morning Mass for a Catholic school in South Minneapolis Wednesday morning, killing two children and injuring at least 17 ...

item.title: Trump calls for racketeering charges against top Democratic donor, son
item.description: The president accused George and Alex Soros of supporting “Violent Protests,” an accusation their organization called “outrageous and false.”

item.title: Democrats win special Iowa state Senate race, boosting optimism nationally
item.description: An upset victory by Catelin Drey flips a seat formerly held by a Republican in the conservative-leaning district that Trump easily won in 2024.

item.title: Trump privately pushed top state lawmakers to redistrict
item.description: Indiana Republicans remain split, but Trump and Vance directly appealed to state leaders at the White House as part of redistricting fight.

item.title: Michael Anton, longtime MAGA intellectual, to exit State Dept.
item.description: A member of President George W. Bush’s National Security Council, Anton later urged reluctant conservatives to back Donald Trump in 2016.

item.title: Trump to hold meeting on Gaza aid efforts amid conflict and famine
item.description: U.S. Special Envoy to the Middle East and Russia Steve Witkoff blamed Hamas for holding up a truce. He projected a deal by the end of the year.

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
